en-US.summary: Timeless sayings of Imam Ali ibn Abi Talib (as), as compiled in Nahajul Balagha, the Peak of Eloquence
examplePhrases: Alexa, Tell me something from Nahjul Balagha
Alexa, Give me a quote from Nahjul Balagha
en-US.name: Nahajul Balagha - Sayings from Imam Ali
en-US.description:
Referred by Prophet Muhammad as the “gate to the city of knowledge.”, this skill contains quotes from Imam Ali, compiled in the literary masterpiece Nahjul Balagha.

From one of Islam's greatest saints, its full of everyday life lessons and motivational advice that appeal to everyone, not just Muslims.

Accompanying cards include the original arabic, as no translation can capture the eloquence of the original text.
